Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scarab
Description: Lovely and well-shaped scarab with depictions of the head, serrated clypeus, prothorax, elytra and crenellated legs. On the reverse is engraved the beginning of a title surrounded by flat spirals: "The overseer of ...".  It is possible that the owner's name started with the letter "i".
